TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Substitution extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 指定輸出快取網頁上不需要快取的區段。

span.span: Specifies a section on an output-cached Web page that is exempt from caching.

summary.span: 在這個位置，擷取和替代 控制項的動態內容。

span.span: At this location, dynamic content is retrieved and substituted for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項以在您想要動態內容輸出快取網頁上指定區段取代為控制項。Use the control to specify a section on an output-cached Web page where you want dynamic content substituted for the control. 控制項提供簡化的解決方案，部分頁面快取的快取的大部分內容所在的頁面。The control offers a simplified solution to partial page caching for pages where the majority of the content is cached. 您可以輸出快取整個頁面，並使用控制項，以指定的組件頁面的需要快取。You can output-cache the entire page, and then use controls to specify the parts of the page that are exempt from caching. 快取的區域僅執行一次，直到快取項目過期，或清除快取中重新執行。Cached regions execute only once and are replayed from the cache until the cache entry expires or is purged. 動態區域執行每次要求頁面時。Dynamic regions execute each time the page is requested. 此快取模型簡化了主要是靜態的因為您沒有封裝到 Web 使用者控制項中的快取區段頁面的程式碼。This caching model simplifies the code for pages that are primarily static, because you do not have to encapsulate the sections to cache in Web user controls. 例如，此快取模型適合在案例中必須包含靜態內容，例如新聞內容、 網頁和與會顯示廣告的控制項。For example, this caching model is useful in a scenario where you have a page that contains static content, such as news stories, and an control that displays advertisements. 不變更新聞報導，這表示它們可以快取處理。The news stories do not change, which means that they can be cached. 不過，的每當使用者要求頁面時，您會想要顯示新的廣告。However, each time a user requests the page, you want to display a new advertisement. 控制項直接支援快取後替代，並呈現新的廣告每次在網頁回傳後，不論是否快取頁面。The control directly supports post-cache substitution and renders a new advertisement each time the page posts back, regardless of whether the page is cached. > [!NOTE] > 您可以將中快取的頁面包含使用者控制項中的控制項。You can place a control in a user control that is contained in a cached page. 不過，您不能放置輸出快取使用者控制項中的控制項。However, you cannot place a control in an output-cached user control. 當控制項執行時，它會呼叫的方法，傳回的字串。When the control executes, it calls a method that returns a string. 此方法會傳回字串是要顯示在 [位置] 頁面上的內容控制項。The string that the method returns is the content to display on the page at the location of the control. 使用屬性來指定時所叫用的回呼方法的名稱控制項執行。Use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 您指定的回呼方法必須包含的網頁或使用者控制項上的靜態方法控制項。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or user control that contains the control. 回呼方法的簽章必須符合的簽章委派，會取得參數並傳回的字串。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 若要管理頁面的輸出快取，您可以使用[@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞，但類別，或屬性。To manipulate the output cache for a page, you can use the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive, the class, or the property. 如需有關快取頁面的詳細資訊，請參閱[快取的 ASP.NET 網頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100))並[快取部分 ASP.NET 網頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e)。For more information on caching pages, see [Caching ASP.NET Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100)) and [Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e). 若要使用替代控制項，您也可以取得快取行為所使用的替代委派。As an alternative to using the control, you can also get substitution caching behavior using a delegate. 此外，您可以在這裡取得快取行為的控制項，例如替代控制項，可直接支援這項功能。In addition, you can get substitution caching behavior on controls, such as the control, that directly support this feature. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 動態更新的部分快取的網頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09c9bd9a-0d68-4a5c-aa6f-1b461c208795)。For more information, see [Dynamically Updating Portions of a Cached Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09c9bd9a-0d68-4a5c-aa6f-1b461c208795). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增宣告至輸出快取網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control declaratively to an output-cached Web page. 當頁面載入目前的日期和時間會顯示在標籤中的使用者。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 本節中的頁面快取，並只每隔 60 秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 當控制項執行時，它會呼叫`GetCurrentDateTime`方法。When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method. 所傳回的字串`GetCurrentDateTime`顯示給使用者。The string returned by `GetCurrentDateTime` is displayed to the user. 本節中的頁面不會快取，並每次重新整理頁面時都會更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionsClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionsClass1/CS/substitutionclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionsClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionsClass1/VB/substitutionclass1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增以程式設計方式來輸出快取的網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control programmatically to an output-cached Web page. 當頁面載入目前的日期和時間會顯示在標籤中的使用者。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 本節中的頁面快取，並只每隔 60 秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 當控制項執行時，它會呼叫`GetCurrentDateTime`方法。When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method. 所傳回的字串`GetCurrentDateTime`顯示給使用者。The string returned by `GetCurrentDateTime` is displayed to the user. 本節中的頁面不會快取，並每次重新整理頁面時都會更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/CS/substitutioncstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/VB/substitutioncstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 傳回 物件，表示 控制項不支援子控制項。

span.span: Returns an object, indicating that the control does not support child controls.

returns.span: ，表示控制項不支援子控制項。

span.span: An , indicating that the control does not support child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用來建立物件來儲存控制項的子控制項。The method is typically used to create a object to store the child controls for a control. 實作方法控制永遠傳回物件，表示控制項不支援子控制項。The implementation of the method for a control always returns an object, to indicate that the control does not support child controls.

para.span: 在擴充您可以覆寫控制項，中衍生的類別，以支援子控制項的方法。

span.span: When extending the control, you can override the method in a derived class to support child controls.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項執行時要叫用的回呼方法名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes.

value.span: 字串，表示 控制項執行時要叫用的方法名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method to invoke when the control executes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定時所叫用的回呼方法的名稱控制項執行。Use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 您指定的回呼方法必須包含的網頁或使用者控制項上的靜態方法控制項。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or user control that contains the control. 回呼方法的簽章必須符合的簽章委派，會取得參數並傳回的字串。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for a delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 回呼方法會傳回字串是要顯示在 [位置] 頁面上的內容控制項。The string that the callback method returns is the content to display on the page at the location of the control. 參數封裝關於個別 HTTP 要求的所有 HTTP 特定資訊。The parameter encapsulates all HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request. 您可以使用它來存取工作階段變數、 授權資訊和個人化的詳細資料。You can use it to access session variables, authorization information, and personalization details. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增宣告至輸出快取網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control declaratively to an output-cached Web page. 當頁面載入時，靜態項目符號清單會顯示給使用者。When the page loads, a static bulleted list is displayed to the user. 本節中的頁面快取，並只每隔 60 秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 當控制項執行時，它會呼叫`GetUser`方法，以傳回字串，表示目前的使用者。When the control executes, it calls the `GetUser` method, which returns a string that represents the current user. 這個字串會顯示在的位置頁面上的控制項。This string is displayed at the location of the control on the page. 本節中的頁面不會快取，並每次重新整理頁面時都會更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Substitution.MethodName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Substitution.MethodName/CS/substitution.methodnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Substitution.MethodName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Substitution.MethodName/VB/substitution.methodnamevb.aspx#1)]
